Best Brownies

  • 1 cup (2 sticks) unsalted butter
  • 2 cups granulated sugar
  • 4 large eggs
  • 3/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 1 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  1. Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Line 9x13 pan with parchment.
  2. Melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat.
  3. Remove from heat and stir in sugar until combined.
  4. Beat in eggs one at a time, then vanilla.
  5. Stir in cocoa powder, flour, and salt until just combined.
  6. Pour into prepared pan and bake 25-30 minutes.
Prep: 15 minutes Cook: 30 minutes Makes: 24 brownies
